title: From the Darkness We Rise
description: Rise of the Guardians Fanfiction - Jack Frost/Pitch BlackTwenty two years have passed since the defeat of Pitch, and Jack lives alone, touch-starved, with only the company of a solitary Nightmare. One evening the Man in the Moon sets him on a path that will lead him to unexpected relationships, draw the attention of the Guardians to a new coalition of villains, and challenge Jack's every notion of what it is to be good, evil, and what it is to live in the shadows.Words:157465 complete
author: Pia Foxhall
